description:

description:
This week on Polygon, we’re looking at games that feel like vacations for your brain. A… foggy small town designed to scare you? We’re celebrating the cozy places worth visiting when you want to relax, whether the games were designed with that purpose in mind or not. Welcome to Retreat Week.

description: If someone asked you about your favorite place in a Pokémon game, you likely wouldn’t tell them the name of a route. After all, what is a route but a tiring link between cooler stuff?
